articles.author: Abbie Llewelyn
articles.title: Man fails job interview after being rude to receptionist (who was secretly the recruitment manager) - Daily Mail
articles.description: The story was revealed on Reddit's 'Life Pro Tips' forum by an employee at the mystery firm. The candidate was told 'this interview is over', after being 'dismissive' to the receptionist.
articles.content:
First impressions really do count - so much so it saw a unwitting job candidate fall at an unseen first hurdle during the interview process. 
The man was immediately rejected for his prized role wit… [+2647 chars]
